com.lithium.community.android.ui.components.adapters

Class LiMessageListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • com.lithium.community.android.ui.components.adapters.LiBaseRecyclerAdapter
        • com.lithium.community.android.ui.components.adapters.LiMessageListAdapter

  • public class LiMessageListAdapter
extends LiBaseRecyclerAdapter
    RecyclerView.Adapter that can display a LiMessage and makes a call to the specified LiOnMessageRowClickListener. Extends LiBaseRecyclerAdapter to displays the article rows. This adapter is used where ever we want to show common article row view.

    • Field Summary
